Articles.Content: I don't think I've seen a suggestion for parachutes for individual kerbals. This could be useful when bailing out of ships when things go really REALLY wrong.

VNG parachutes:

kerbalspaceprogram.com/vanguard-technologies-eva-parachutes/Ã¢â‚¬Å½

Requires the normal VNG plugin though.

You've not seen it because it's on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread]. Please take a cursory glance over its contents before suggesting something on the list, please

/thread.
